query: "Can you tell me if my PHQ-2 total score has changed over time?"
resource_summaries:
This record is an Observation of a Patient Health Questionnaire 2 item (PHQ-2) total score reported on September 8, 2021, with a value of 1.
This record documents a completed depression screening procedure using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score on a patient during an encounter with a primary care provider on August 16, 2017.
answer: Yes, your PHQ-2 total score has changed over time. It was 1 on September 8, 2021, and 0 on August 16, 2017.
